channel.title: [Showoff] Minimap blur
channel.description:
[img width=783 height=541]http://i.imgur.com/j0UiFiD.png[/img]
It is a separate minimap state, like locked and blacked out.

item.title: [Showoff] Minimap blur
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Should make the square indicating where you’re standing more of a ‘pixelated’ look for a blurred essence.

If you don’t understand what I’m talking about, this image will somewhat describe it:

Just that in a small, square form.

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff] Minimap blur
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

I did this for Astrect except it was used to blur more than just the minimap, used it to blur the viewport and sections of the gameframe as well as the minimap. Created a SC packet for it with a byte written as the state (state 1 would be minimap, 2 viewport etc etc)

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff] Minimap blur
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

I’ll take this in consideration for my Avarrocka Project. Good job on this.

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff] Minimap blur
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:12, topic:538397”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=657219.msg4397217#msg4397217 date=1389491648]

Dang! I used to dream of having this in the wilderness.

this. would make clan battles etc much more interesting… not exactly knowing where a team is coming from.

All map icons are hidden in the display mode. I’m thinking about showing player icons but randomising it (showing some enemies as friends, some friends as enemies).
[/quote]

so are you saying it would display an enemy as a green dot, as if it was a friend, to trick the player? if that’s what you meant i hate that completely. that’s not really fun or just being deceptive in a fun way if you know what i mean, that’s just plain wrong lol[/quote]

It would only do it when the server tells it to, it would display random players of the same team as a green dot, and random players of other teams as though they are in the same team (by team I mean the team from the team-# capes.) I won’t mess with the way friends are displayed.

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff] Minimap blur
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Togasa:

I’ve seen the minimap ‘blaced’ out before… but never blurred… pretty nice…any hints on how to do?

Look at how a basic blur algorithm works and implement it when the minimap is drawn I couldn’t get it to blur the map marker sprites without it looking odd because of the transparency.

Read full topic
